title: Client not opening at all, i need help pls :(
body: When i try to open League all i get is the logo popping up then disappearing and nothing happening. This only started to occur when i upgrade to Windows 10. I have look everywhere for a solution and all have lead to nothing, pls hep.

replies.body: We can help with this!  Your OS update may have adjusted your security settings and blocking league from opening.  Run through the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to get this fixed up.
I have done all of the steps from the permissions guide and still it won't open.

Hey there, in that case download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to collect some logs and attach it to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for some context.  Our tech team will be available to work with you individually and figure this out.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can!
